Text.Name: Gong_13_None
Text.Desc: A surpreme law created by the Perfected Warroir. After learning this law, one can form yin and yang inside, create yin and yang golden cores then also achieve yin and yang primordial spirits. When training sub-spirits, one can gain twice the effect of half effort. It is the most famouse law of the Perfected Warroir in Wudang Mountain. It is very mysterious.
Text.SelectDesc: After practicing this law, the attainment obtained by understanding the mystery also separated to Yin and Yang. Although it can greatly improve the upper limit of cultivators' strength, the proportion of attainment between yin and Yang will also fundamentally affect the cultivators' accomplishments. This method steals the mystery of yin and Yang in heaven and earth and is greatly envied by heaven. Therefore, the power of the tribulation is extremely powerful.
Text.Stages.0.Necks.0.Desc: [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough is more difficult for characters with low Perception.[/color]
Text.Stages.1.Necks.0.Desc: [color=#D06508]\nThis breakthrough is more difficult for characters with low Constitution.[/color]
